title: Joystick Like CONTROL On A Keyboard?! - Wooting two HE Analog
description: Save 10% and Free Worldwide Shipping by using offer code CIRCUIT at   The Wooting two HE Analog keyboard simulates gradual movement and control like a joystick. It's not 100% perfect but it's something that can make driving and flying a bit easier in games if you only have a mouse and keyboard.   Check out the Wooting two HE Analog Keyboard at   Buy Microsoft Xbox Series X Controller On Amazon (Paid Link):  On Best Buy (Paid Link):  On BHPhoto (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
